credit_line: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: Band
medium:
Medium: silk of many colors, gold metallic foil wound onto yellow silk, silver metallic foil wound onto white silk.
Technique: needle lace
description: Border of gold metallic lace with colored silks in a pattern of floral and foliated forms and animal images. Gold is wound around a linen core to create a metallic thread.
name: Band
